name: Web gallery
description:
In development__Desktop/Laptop version__build19|05|20v.05 [Exit bug: to regain your cursor back to your browser press ESC multiple times. Microsoft Edge Compatibility issues, Win10]

 A Virtual Gallery to showcase my fine art portfolio.

Controls : Mouse Click to start>WASD/Cursor Keys Forward/Left/Backward/Right movement - Mouse or Trackpad to look around - ESC to release cursor.

Unity 2019.3.0f6. | Blender | Photoshop CC2020 | Original Paintings.

To do:  Post Processing | Web Optimisation | Additional Content | Volumetric Lighting | External Buildings
